chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 13 has the above problem. My package was supposed to arrive on Thursday, May 23rd - I was there all day and waited. Then came the message - it will arrive on May 24th - which is when I was at work. On Monday, May 27th, I received a notification that I can pick up my package at the pickup station. Yesterday (May 28th), I went there but there was no package. UPS says it was sent back to the sender again. Why? I would have picked it up - but had no chance. Where is the package now and who gave the order to return the package?

Dear ecomobile

please reship the package to this adress.

Viviana Haye
Displayreparatur 123,
Bahnhofstr. 35, 
27749 Delmenhorst
Deutschland
0179 1842824
vivi.haye@freenet.de

Regards,
Aysu from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this. We will inform our logistcs partner about the reshipment of the package.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The device is being shipped by UPS under tracking number 1ZBF1560D901155907.

Regards,
SY

Dear ecomobile

could you recieved the packgae?

Regards,
Aysu from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer on 31st May. Kindly check with the customer whether if they have received it.
https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_SG&requester=ST/trackdetails

Regards,
JY
